ygData.msgSnippet: ... No, the ice giants inside Permafrost just have a huge aggro radius.  Usually they aggro on you before you ever see them. Once the two idiots got the giants
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 21 Feb 2000 John_Senior@... wrote:
>
> The incident that happened was when we was happily controlling the spawn in
> the king room when two low 30's people came along, decided to run down
> through the doors and trained 2 Giants (we had killed the diplomat). After
> killing both these people they came for me. I tried to make a runner but
> only got to the flag room.
>
> This also shows that bard song taunts have not been reduced, god knows how

No, the ice giants inside Permafrost just have a huge aggro
radius. Usually they aggro on you before you ever see them.
Once the two idiots got the giants close to you and died, the
giants aggroed on all of you. Since you were playing a song,
you got placed higher on the hate list than anyone else there,
and promptly got killed.

Subjectively, I'd say our taunt has been reduced a bit.
Granted I was fighting bugs in Sol B which tend not to care.
But it seemed to me I had to work harder to get things to
attack me, even when I was using the Celerity, Hymn, Chain
combo (the latter two are pretty good taunts).

--
